statements: DELETE FROM CalibrationSettings WHERE setting_name = 'Temperature' AND parameter_type = 'Threshold';
DELETE FROM CalibrationSettings WHERE setting_name = 'temperature' AND parameter_value > 100;
DELETE FROM calibration_settings WHERE id = 3 AND setting_name = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM calibration_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 10 AND parameter_name = 'pressure';
DELETE FROM calibration_settings WHERE parameter_name = 'threshold' AND parameter_value > 0.5
DELETE FROM sensor_parameters WHERE calibration_id = 1 AND sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM calibration_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
